trans-unit.source: Isolates into a separate class methods that are used by the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control and can be overridden by developers who extend the control, but are rarely needed by page developers.
trans-unit.target: 隔離成不同的類別方法，<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> 控制項會使用這些方法，而且擴充控制項的開發人員會覆寫這些方法，但網頁開發人員很少需要這些方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class is the largest class in the Web Parts control set.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>類別是在 Web 組件控制項集合中的最大類別。

trans-unit.source: It is also among the most important Web Parts classes because it is used on every Web page that contains Web Parts controls, and it coordinates and manages all Web Parts controls on a page.
trans-unit.target: 它也是最重要的 Web 組件類別，因此它適用於每個網頁，其中包含 Web 組件的控制項，它會協調和管理頁面上的所有 Web 組件控制項。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class is used so frequently, and because it contains so many exposed methods, some methods needed mostly by control developers who are extending the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control are contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> class.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>，經常會使用類別和它包含許多公開的方法，因此某些方法需要主要由控制項開發人員擴充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制項包含在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals>類別。

trans-unit.source: This isolation of less-used methods into the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> class simplifies the API of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class, and the isolated methods do not appear on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> object in IntelliSense.
trans-unit.target: 這種隔離的較少使用的方法，到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals>類別簡化的 API<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>類別，而隔離的方法不會出現在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>在 IntelliSense 中的物件。

trans-unit.source: Developers who use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> class are likely to have scenarios where they need to inherit from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control and customize it extensively.
trans-unit.target: 使用開發人員<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals>類別都可能有的案例它們要繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制並廣泛地自訂它。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are building a Web portal application or a packaged set of Web Parts controls with custom display modes, custom zones, custom verbs, custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, and other extensions of the base Web Parts user interface (UI), in many cases (not all) you will need to override and extend some of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> members.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您要建置 Web 入口網站應用程式或自訂的顯示模式的 Web 組件控制項的封裝的集合，自訂區域、 自訂動詞命令，自訂<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項和其他擴充功能的基底 Web 組件使用者介面 (UI)，在許多情況下 (not所有） 您要覆寫，並擴充某些<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>成員。

trans-unit.source: And although the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> class is sealed so you cannot inherit from it, your custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class will likely need to call a number of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> methods in order to manage Web Parts controls on a page.
trans-unit.target: 而即使<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals>類別密封格式，因此您無法從它繼承，您的自訂<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>類別可能需要撥打的號碼<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals>方法，才能管理頁面上的 Web 組件控制項。

trans-unit.source: Like the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> class provides a server control that has no UI and is never visible on a page.
trans-unit.target: 像<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>類別<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals>類別提供了沒有 ui 而且永遠不會出現在頁面上的伺服器控制項。

trans-unit.source: Unlike <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> class is never declared in the markup of a page; it is strictly a worker object that performs background tasks.
trans-unit.target: 不同於<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals>類別永遠不會在網頁標記中宣告; 受限於它是執行背景工作的背景工作物件。

trans-unit.source: The typical way of using it is demonstrated by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class, which references it by means of the protected <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Internals%2A> property, and uses the referenced object to call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> methods.
trans-unit.target: 示範使用它的典型方式是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>類別，即在參考透過受保護<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Internals%2A>屬性，以及使用參考的物件來呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> class contains only methods; there are no properties or events.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals>類別僅包含方法，則沒有任何屬性或事件。

trans-unit.source: All the methods in the class involve managing <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, or connections between controls.
trans-unit.target: 類別中的所有方法牽涉都到管理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項之間的連接。

trans-unit.source: To handle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> includes methods for adding them (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.AddWebPart%2A>), removing them <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.RemoveWebPart%2A>), handling events <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.CallOnDeleting%2A>), getting or setting details about their relationship to their zone (for example, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.GetZoneID%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetZoneIndex%2A>), or setting basic <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control properties (for example, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsClosed%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetHasSharedData%2A>).
trans-unit.target: 處理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals>包含方法，以加入它們 (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.AddWebPart%2A>)，移除這些<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.RemoveWebPart%2A>)，處理事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.CallOnDeleting%2A>)、 取得或設定其關聯性的詳細資料到其區域 (例如， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.GetZoneID%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetZoneIndex%2A>)，或設定基本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制屬性 (例如，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsClosed%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetHasSharedData%2A>)。

trans-unit.source: To handle connections, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> includes methods for deleting them (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.DeleteConnection%2A>), setting which transformer object to use (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetTransformer%2A>), setting whether a connection is shared and whether it is static (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsShared%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection%2CSystem.Boolean%29> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsStatic%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection%2CSystem.Boolean%29>), and setting a connection error message to use (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetConnectErrorMessage%2A>).
trans-unit.target: 若要處理連接，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals>包含刪除的方法 (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.DeleteConnection%2A>)，設定要使用的轉換程式物件 (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetTransformer%2A>)，設定連接是否為共用，以及是否為靜態 (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsShared%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection%2CSystem.Boolean%29>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsStatic%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection%2CSystem.Boolean%29>)，並設定要使用的連接錯誤訊息 (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetConnectErrorMessage%2A>)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> being added to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control's collection of controls.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />，加入 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> 控制項之控制項集合。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> or server control to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control's collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 或伺服器控制項加入至網頁上 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> 控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> that has been selected for closing.
trans-unit.target: 已選定要關閉的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />。

trans-unit.source: Calls the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnClosing(System.EventArgs)" /> method of the specified control.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫指定控制項的 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnClosing(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> that has entered or exited the connect display mode.
trans-unit.target: 已進入或離開連線顯示模式的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />。

trans-unit.source: Calls the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnConnectModeChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method of the specified control.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫指定控制項的 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnConnectModeChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> that has been selected for deletion.
trans-unit.target: 已選定要刪除的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />。

trans-unit.source: Calls the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnDeleting(System.EventArgs)" /> method of the specified control.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫指定控制項的 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnDeleting(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> that has entered or exited edit display mode.
trans-unit.target: 已進入或離開編輯顯示模式的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />。

trans-unit.source: Calls the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnEditModeChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method of the specified control.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫指定控制項的 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnEditModeChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> that has been selected for deletion.
trans-unit.target: 已選定要刪除的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" />。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> object has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: 指出是否已刪除指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether the connection has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: 布林值，指出是否已刪除連接。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the object to create.
trans-unit.target: 要建立之物件的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates an object based on the parameter passed to the method.
trans-unit.target: 根據傳遞給方法的參數建立物件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> of the same type as <paramref name="type" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <paramref name="type" /> 相同型別的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: The method uses the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeGenerator> class to create the type, an alternative that offers better performance than using the <xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法會使用<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeGenerator>類別來建立類型，提供更佳的效能比使用替代<xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> that has been selected for deletion.
trans-unit.target: 已選定要刪除的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" />。

trans-unit.source: Sets a property to indicate that the specified connection object has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: 設定屬性，表示已刪除指定的連接物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.DeleteConnection%2A> method is one step in the process of terminating an existing connection between two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or other server controls on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.DeleteConnection%2A>方法是正在終止現有的連接兩個的其中一個步驟<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>或在網頁上其他伺服器控制項。

trans-unit.source: It sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.ConnectionDeleted%2A> property value to `true` to indicate that `connection` is deleted.
trans-unit.target: 它會設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.ConnectionDeleted%2A>屬性值設定為`true`表示`connection`被刪除。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> that resides in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 位於區域中的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the ID of a zone that contains the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> or server control.
trans-unit.target: 取得包含指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 或伺服器控制項的區域 ID。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the ID of the zone that contains <paramref name="webPart" />.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示包含 <paramref name="webPart" /> 之區域的 ID。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.GetZoneID%2A> method returns the ID of the zone that contains the control referenced by the `webPart` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.GetZoneID%2A>方法會傳回包含所參考之控制項的區域識別碼`webPart`參數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A> property of `webPart` references the actual zone object that contains `webPart`, not the ID of the zone.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A>屬性`webPart`參考包含實際的區域物件`webPart`，不該區域的識別碼。

trans-unit.source: If `webPart` is currently closed, the value of its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A> property is `null`, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.GetZoneID%2A> method will return the ID of the last zone that `webPart` was in prior to being closed.
trans-unit.target: 如果`webPart`目前已關閉，值及其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A>屬性是`null`，而<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.GetZoneID%2A>方法會傳回識別碼的最後一個區域，`webPart`之前關閉。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> that is used to connect controls.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" />，用於連接控制項。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains the previously saved state data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，包含先前儲存的狀態資料。

trans-unit.source: Loads previously saved state data for a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> object that participates in a connection between controls.
trans-unit.target: 為參與控制項之間連接的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> 物件，載入先前儲存的狀態資料。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> or other server control to be removed.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 或其他伺服器控制項。

trans-unit.source: Removes a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> or other server control from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control's collection of controls.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項的控制項集合移除 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> 或其他伺服器控制項。

trans-unit.source: Removes `webPart` from the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control's collection of Web Parts controls that it maintains for the page.
trans-unit.target: 移除`webPart`從目前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>保持頁面的 Web 組件控制項的控制項集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> that is used to connect controls.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" />，用於連接控制項。

trans-unit.source: Saves state data for a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> object that participates in a connection between controls.
trans-unit.target: 儲存參與控制項之間連接的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> 物件之狀態資料。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains the saved state data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，包含儲存的狀態資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SaveConfigurationState%2A> method saves configuration data that is created when a user configures a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> control on a Web page as part of a connection between controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SaveConfigurationState%2A>方法會儲存使用者設定時所建立的組態資料<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>控制項在網頁上控制項之間的連接的一部分。

trans-unit.source: This configuration data is then reloaded each time the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> control is rendered, by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.LoadConfigurationState%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此設定資料然後重新載入每次<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>轉譯控制項時，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.LoadConfigurationState%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> that participates in a connection with another control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />，參與其他控制項的連接。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the text of the error message.
trans-unit.target: 包含錯誤訊息文字的字串。

trans-unit.source: Establishes an errors message, and causes the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome" /> object that is responsible for rendering a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control to render that message rather than the contents of the control.
trans-unit.target: 建立錯誤訊息，並且讓負責呈現 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome" /> 控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 物件呈現該訊息，而不是控制項的內容。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetConnectErrorMessage%2A> method allows you to associate an error message with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control that participates in connections.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetConnectErrorMessage%2A>方法可讓您建立關聯的錯誤訊息<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>參與連線的控制項。

trans-unit.source: If an error occurs when another control is forming a connection with the control referenced by the `webPart` parameter, then after the connection process has failed, the error message is displayed in the user interface (UI), rather than the contents of `webPart`.
trans-unit.target: 如果另一個控制項建立連接，與所參考的控制項時發生錯誤`webPart`參數，然後在連線程序失敗後，會顯示錯誤訊息中的使用者介面 (UI)，而不是的內容`webPart`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome> object associated with `webPart` renders the error message in its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.RenderPartContents%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>物件相關聯`webPart`轉譯中的錯誤訊息其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.RenderPartContents%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> or other server control that can have shared personalization data.
trans-unit.target: 可以具有共用個人化資料的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 或其他伺服器控制項。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether <c>webPart</c> has shared data.
trans-unit.target: 指出 <c>webPart</c> 是否具有共用資料的布林值。

trans-unit.source: Sets a property on a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> or other server control indicating whether the control has shared personalization data.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 或其他伺服器控制項上設定屬性，指出控制項是否具有共用個人化資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetHasSharedData%2A> method indicates whether `webPart` has shared personalization data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetHasSharedData%2A>方法會指出是否`webPart`已共用的個人化資料。

trans-unit.source: The value of the `hasSharedData` parameter that is passed into the method is assigned to the `webPart` control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HasSharedData%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 值`hasSharedData`傳遞至方法的參數指派給`webPart`控制項的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HasSharedData%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> or other server control that can have user personalization data.
trans-unit.target: 可以具有使用者個人化資料的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 或其他伺服器控制項。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether <c>webPart</c> has shared data.
trans-unit.target: 指出 <c>webPart</c> 是否具有共用資料的布林值。

trans-unit.source: Sets a property on a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> or other server control indicating whether the control has user personalization data.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 或其他伺服器控制項上設定屬性，指出控制項是否具有使用者個人化資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetHasUserData%2A> method indicates whether `webPart` has individual user personalization data, as opposed to shared data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetHasUserData%2A>方法會指出是否`webPart`有個別的使用者個人化資料，而不是共用資料。

trans-unit.source: The method assigns the value of the `hasUserData` parameter to the `webPart` control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HasUserData%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 方法會將指派的值`hasUserData`參數`webPart`控制項的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HasUserData%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> for which this method sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsClosed" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />，這個方法為其設定 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsClosed" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> is closed on a page.
trans-unit.target: 布林值，指出網頁上的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 是否已關閉。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsClosed" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 設定 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsClosed" /> 控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsClosed%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsClosed%2A> property of `webPart`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsClosed%2A>方法會設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsClosed%2A>屬性`webPart`。

trans-unit.source: This method does not actually close `webPart`; it only sets the property that indicates whether `webPart` is closed.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會實際關閉`webPart`; 它只會設定屬性，指出是否`webPart`已關閉。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control or the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsShared" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 設定 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared" /> 控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 屬性或 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsShared" /> 物件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsShared%2A> method calls a method in a base class to set a property that indicates whether a particular instance of a control is shared.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsShared%2A>方法呼叫的方法來設定此屬性，指出控制項的特定執行個體是否為共用的基底類別中。

trans-unit.source: In the Web Parts control set, a shared control means a control that is visible to all users of a page.
trans-unit.target: Web 組件集中控制，共用的控制表示網頁的所有使用者都都可以看到的控制項。

trans-unit.source: This is in contrast to a per-user control, which is visible only to the specific user who added the control to the page.
trans-unit.target: 這是相較於每個使用者控制項，也就是只將控制項加入頁面的特定使用者為可見。

trans-unit.source: For more on personalization and shared versus per-user controls, see [Web Parts Personalization Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320).
trans-unit.target: 多個在個人化和共用與每個使用者控制項，請參閱[Web 組件個人化概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> for which this method sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />，這個方法為其設定 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether <c>webPart</c> is shared.
trans-unit.target: 指出 <c>webPart</c> 是否為共用的布林值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 設定 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared" /> 控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsShared%2A> method does not actually cause the control referenced by the `webPart` parameter to be shared; it only sets the property that indicates whether `webPart` is currently shared.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsShared%2A>方法實際上也不會導致參考的控制項`webPart`參數共用; 它只會設定屬性，指出是否`webPart`目前共用。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> between two <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" />，位於兩個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項之間。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether <c>connection</c> is shared.
trans-unit.target: 指出 <c>connection</c> 是否為共用的布林值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsShared" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 設定 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsShared" /> 物件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsShared%2A> method does not actually cause the control referenced by the `connection` parameter to be shared; it only sets the property that indicates whether `connection` is currently shared.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsShared%2A>方法實際上也不會導致參考的控制項`connection`參數共用; 它只會設定屬性，指出是否`connection`目前共用。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> for which this method sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStandalone" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />，這個方法為其設定 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStandalone" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether <c>webPart</c> is a standalone control.
trans-unit.target: 指出 <c>webPart</c> 是否為獨立控制項的布林值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStandalone" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 設定 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStandalone" /> 控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsStandalone%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStandalone%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsStandalone%2A>方法會設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStandalone%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true` on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, it means that the control is not contained within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone.
trans-unit.target: 當這個屬性設定為`true`上<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項，表示控制項未包含在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>區域。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStatic" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control or the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsStatic" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 設定 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStatic" /> 控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 屬性或 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsStatic" /> 物件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsStatic%2A> method calls a method in a base class to set a property that indicates whether a particular instance of a control is static.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsStatic%2A>方法呼叫的方法來設定此屬性，指出是否為靜態控制項的特定執行個體的基底類別中。

trans-unit.source: In the Web Parts control set, a static control is a control that is declared in the markup of a Web page.
trans-unit.target: Web 組件控制項集合中，靜態控制項是在網頁標記中宣告的控制項。

trans-unit.source: This is in contrast to a dynamic control, which is either added to a page programmatically, or added by a user from a catalog of controls.
trans-unit.target: 這是相較於動態控制項，可加入至網頁以程式設計的方式，或者加入由使用者從控制項的目錄。

trans-unit.source: A static control is inherently a shared control, meaning that it is visible to all users of a page, and although users can close a static control, they can never delete (permanently remove) it.
trans-unit.target: 靜態控制項原本就是共用的控制項，這表示，它會顯示的頁面上，所有使用者，雖然使用者可以關閉靜態控制項，但是可以永遠不會刪除 （永久移除） 它。

trans-unit.source: For more on personalization, static versus dynamic controls, and shared versus per-user controls, see [Web Parts Personalization Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320).
trans-unit.target: 如需個人化的詳細資訊，靜態和動態控制項，以及共用與每個使用者控制項，請參閱[Web 組件個人化概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320)。

trans-unit.source: The control for which the property value is being set.
trans-unit.target: 為其設定屬性值的控制項。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether <c>webPart</c> is static.
trans-unit.target: 指出 <c>webPart</c> 是否為靜態的布林值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStatic" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 設定 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStatic" /> 控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsStatic%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Boolean%29> method is used to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStatic%2A> property value of the control referenced by the `webPart` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsStatic%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Boolean%29>方法用來設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStatic%2A>屬性值所參考的控制項`webPart`參數。

trans-unit.source: If `webPart` is declared within a zone in the markup of a Web page, this method sets the property value to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`webPart`在網頁上，這個方法會設定屬性值的標記中的區域中宣告了`true`。

trans-unit.source: If `webPart` is added to a page programmatically, or by a user through the Web Parts user interface (UI), then this method sets the property value to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`webPart`會加入至網頁以程式設計的方式，或由使用者透過 Web 組件的使用者介面 (UI)，這個方法會將屬性值設`false`。

trans-unit.source: The connection for which the property value is being set.
trans-unit.target: 為其設定屬性值的連接。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether <c>connection</c> is static.
trans-unit.target: 指出 <c>connection</c> 是否為靜態的布林值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsStatic" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 設定 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsStatic" /> 物件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsStatic%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection%2CSystem.Boolean%29> method is used to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsStatic%2A> property value of the connection referenced by the `connection` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsStatic%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection%2CSystem.Boolean%29>方法用來設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsStatic%2A>屬性值所參考的連接`connection`參數。

trans-unit.source: If `connection` is declared in the markup of a Web page, this method sets the property value to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`connection`網頁上，這個方法會設定屬性值的標記中宣告`true`。

trans-unit.source: If `connection` is added to a page programmatically, or by a user through the Web Parts user interface (UI), then this method sets the property value to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`connection`會加入至網頁以程式設計的方式，或由使用者透過 Web 組件的使用者介面 (UI)，這個方法會將屬性值設`false`。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> that creates a connection between server controls.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" />，會在伺服器控制項之間建立連接。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> to be used with <c>connection</c>.
trans-unit.target: 與 <c>connection</c> 搭配使用的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" />。

trans-unit.source: Assigns a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> object to be used in a connection between two server controls.
trans-unit.target: 指派要在兩個伺服器控制項之間的連接中使用的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: When a connection between two server controls requires a transformer so that the consumer control can interpret data from the provider control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetTransformer%2A> method is called to supply a specific <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object.
trans-unit.target: 當兩個伺服器控制項之間的連線需要轉換程式，以便消費者控制項可以解譯資料，從提供者的控制項，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetTransformer%2A>呼叫方法，提供特定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>物件。

trans-unit.source: If the connection already has a transformer assigned to it, the object referenced by the `transformer` parameter overrides the existing one; otherwise, the object referenced in the `transformer` parameter is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果連接已有指派給它的轉換器，所參考的物件`transformer`參數會覆寫現有; 否則在參考的物件`transformer`使用參數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetTransformer%2A> method whenever you call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A> method to establish a connection that requires a transformer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetTransformer%2A>每當您呼叫的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A>方法，以建立需要轉換程式的連接。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> whose <c>zoneID</c> property value is being set.
trans-unit.target: 正設定其 <c>zoneID</c> 屬性值的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the ID of the zone that <c>webPart</c> belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 包含 <c>webPart</c> 所屬區域之 ID 的字串。

trans-unit.source: Sets a property that enables a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> or server control to keep the ID of the containing zone.
trans-unit.target: 設定屬性，讓 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 或伺服器控制項保留包含區域的 ID。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is being added to a zone.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>負責控制何時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項新增至區域。

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control tracks the ID for the zone it belongs to, and this method sets the property that keeps the ID value.
trans-unit.target: 每個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項正在追蹤其所屬的區域的識別碼，這個方法會設定保留的識別碼值的屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control for which the method sets a zone index.
trans-unit.target: 方法設定區域索引的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: The index of <c>webPart</c> within its zone relative to other controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: <c>webPart</c> 在其區域內相對於區域中其他控制項的索引。

trans-unit.source: Sets the index of the specified control within its zone relative to the other <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls within the zone.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的控制項的區域 (與該區域內其他 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項相關聯) 內設定指定控制項的索引。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetZoneIndex%2A> method determines the ordinal position that `webPart` occupies in its zone, relative to other server controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetZoneIndex%2A>方法會判斷序數位置，`webPart`佔用的區域，區域中其他伺服器控制項的相對位置。
